name: @sgmonda/qfu
description: Simple queue system for JS/TS and serverless environments

test.command: rm -Rf coverage && deno test --allow-all --coverage && deno task test:examples && deno coverage --exclude=src/system --exclude=examples

tasks.test:examples:node: cd ./examples/node && npm test && npx -y yarn test && npx -y pnpm test
